title: on me by section 1(2) of the Garda Síochána (Recording Devices) Act 2023 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Recording Devices) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Recording Devices) Act 

2023 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited garda siochana (recording devices) act 2023 (commencement) order 2024

title: on me by section 1(2) of the Garda Síochána (Recording Devices) Act 2023 (No.
heading: 2. The 15th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 15th day of May 2024 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Garda Síochána (Recording Devices) Act 2023 (No. 32 of 
2023) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

Part 1, other than sections 6 and 7; 

Part 2; 

Part 7; 

Part 8; 

Part 9, other than section 49. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 May, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [215] 3
